meanings.definition: A group of antibiotics used in veterinary medicine.
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian prescribed tylosins to treat the infection in the dog's paw.
meanings.sent2: Farmers often use tylosins to keep their livestock healthy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy accidentally got into the tylosins and started a dance party!
meanings.sent4: The tylosins acted like tiny soldiers fighting off the bacteria invaders in the cow's body.
meanings.sent5: The bright orange color of the tylosins made them stand out in the sea of pills.

meanings.definition: The plural form of tylosin, an antibiotic.
meanings.sent1: The vet prescribed two tylosins for the sick cat.
meanings.sent2: She bought a bottle of tylosins from the pharmacy.
meanings.sent3: The tylosins on the shelf seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The tylosins in the jar were like tiny soldiers ready to fight off any infection.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the tylosins reminded her of the farm where they were used.
